problem_text_cn: 如图,⁀{AB}是半圆,O为AB中点,C、D两点在⁀{AB}上,且AD∥OC,连接BC、BD．若⁀{CD}=62°,则的度数为何？()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, ⁀AB is a semicircle, O is the midpoint of AB, the two points C and D are on ⁀AB, and AD ∥ OC, connecting BC and BD. If ⁀CD = N_0, what is the degree? ()
raw_answer: 解:以AB为直径作圆,如图,作直径CM,连接AC,∵AD∥OC,∴∠1=∠2,∴弧AM=弧DC=62°,∴弧AD的度数是180°-62°-62°=56°,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线性质,圆周角定理的应用,关键是求出弧AM的度数．
